nodes.text: The senior officer corps was an officer corps within the Chiss Defense Force.

Before their mission to investigate the Rapacc system, the Springhawk's senior officer corps was assembled on the bridge along with caregiver Thalias and sky-walker Che'ri for a briefing. Lieutenant Commander Azmordi objected to Che'ri and Thalias' presence, declaring the mission should remain within the senior officer corps.
